# DIME — Data In Motion Enterprise

> DIME is a high-performance data integration platform that connects industrial
> and enterprise systems using a connector-based architecture. It uses the
> Disruptor pattern for low-latency message passing between sources and sinks.
> Configuration is YAML-based. Supports 42+ connector types across PLCs,
> databases, message brokers, APIs, and robotics systems.

## Documentation

- [01 — What is DIME?](content/01-what-is-dime.md): Platform overview, N×M integration problem, hub-and-spoke architecture
- [02 — The DIME Ecosystem](content/02-the-dime-ecosystem.md): Zenith cloud, Horizon gateway, Connector edge, Desktop UX
- [03 — Installation](content/03-installation.md): Windows, Linux, and Docker setup with verification steps
- [04 — YAML Configuration](content/04-yaml-basics.md): Config file structure, app/sources/sinks sections, type tags, merge order
- [05 — Architecture](content/05-architecture.md): Ring buffer, message flow, connector lifecycle, source types, admin server
- [06 — Source Connectors](content/06-source-connectors.md): PLCs, MQTT, databases, scrapers, polling vs queuing vs batch
- [07 — Sink Connectors](content/07-sink-connectors.md): InfluxDB, Splunk, MongoDB, MQTT, MTConnect, fan-out dispatch
- [08 — Filtering & Routing](content/08-message-paths-filtering.md): Message paths, $SYSTEM paths, include/exclude filters, strip_path_prefix
- [09 — Scripting](content/09-scripting.md): Five script hooks, Lua vs Python, result object, emit(), helper functions
- [10 — Cache API](content/10-cache-api.md): cache(), set(), cache_ts(), cross-connector access, wait_for_connectors
- [11 — Templates & Output Formatting](content/11-templates-formatting.md): Scriban and Liquid templates, reshaping flat data to nested JSON
- [12 — PLC to Dashboard](content/12-plc-to-dashboard.md): End-to-end walkthrough from OPC-UA source to InfluxDB and WebSocket
- [13 — MQTT Integration](content/13-recipe-mqtt.md): MQTT source/sink, TLS, SparkplugB, edge-to-cloud bridging
- [14 — Database Logging](content/14-recipe-database.md): InfluxDB, relational DB, MongoDB, CSV sinks, database source polling
- [15 — MTConnect & CNC](content/15-recipe-mtconnect.md): MTConnect source, SHDR/Haas, DIME as MTConnect agent, FANUC/Yaskawa
- [16 — Admin REST API](content/16-admin-api.md): GET /status, configuration management, runtime control, Swagger UI
- [17 — WebSocket Monitoring](content/17-websocket-monitoring.md): Admin WebSocket, WebsocketServer sink, zero-dependency dashboards
- [18 — Health & Faults](content/18-health-faults.md): Connector state machine, $SYSTEM telemetry, auto-recovery, alerting
- [19 — Connector UX](content/19-connector-ux.md): Desktop app, live dashboard, Monaco YAML editor, Tauri v2
- [20 — Report By Exception](content/20-report-by-exception.md): RBE at connector and item level, force publish, skip scan cycles
- [21 — Multi-File Configs](content/21-multi-file-configs.md): File splitting, load order, YAML anchors, organization patterns
- [22 — Instance Chaining](content/22-instance-chaining.md): Sink-to-source chaining, edge/aggregator/analytics tiers, hot reconfig
- [23 — Service Deployment](content/23-deploy-service.md): Windows Service, Linux systemd, named instances, logging config
- [24 — Docker Deployment](content/24-deploy-docker.md): docker run, Compose stacks, volumes/ports, ARM64, ROS2 variants
- [25 — Horizon Gateway](content/25-horizon-gateway.md): Pull-based architecture, check-in cycle, task types, deployment options
- [26 — Zenith Cloud](content/26-zenith-cloud.md): ASP.NET Core + MongoDB, fleet state, API endpoints, stale detection
- [27 — Zenith UX](content/27-zenith-ux.md): Fleet tree, live dashboard, deep-dive detail, remote YAML editing
- [28 — Edge to Cloud](content/28-edge-to-cloud.md): Three-tier architecture, upward data flow, downward config propagation
- [29 — Performance Tuning](content/29-performance-tuning.md): Ring buffer sizing, scan_interval, double-buffer, backpressure, metrics
- [30 — Troubleshooting](content/30-troubleshooting.md): No-data diagnosis, persistent faults, script issues, YAML gotchas

## Examples

- [EX01 — Basic Counter](content/EX01-basic-counter.md): Minimal source-to-sink config with Script source and 3 sinks
- [EX02 — Horizon & Zenith Minimum](content/EX02-horizon-zenith-minimum.md): CNC simulator with multi-file config and sink filtering
- [EX03 — OPC-UA Client Reads](content/EX03-opcua-client-reads.md): OPC-UA source to console with multi-file config
- [EX04 — Siemens S7 PLC](content/EX04-siemens-s7-plc.md): S7 PLC source to console
- [EX05 — Modbus TCP Registers](content/EX05-modbus-tcp-registers.md): Modbus device to console
- [EX06 — EtherNet/IP (Rockwell)](content/EX06-ethernet-ip-rockwell.md): EtherNet/IP with MQTT and SparkplugB sinks
- [EX07 — Beckhoff ADS](content/EX07-beckhoff-ads.md): Dual ADS sources to console
- [EX08 — OPC-UA Server Sink](content/EX08-opcua-server-sink.md): Script source publishing to OPC-UA server
- [EX09 — Fanuc Robot](content/EX09-fanuc-robot.md): Fanuc robot with cache-and-derive pattern
- [EX10 — OPC-DA Legacy](content/EX10-opcda-legacy.md): Legacy OPC-DA server integration
- [EX11 — MQTT to WebSocket Bridge](content/EX11-mqtt-to-websocket.md): MQTT broker to WebSocket and console
- [EX12 — Secure MQTT (TLS)](content/EX12-mqtt-secure-tls.md): MQTTS source and sink with TLS certificates
- [EX13 — SparkplugB Industrial MQTT](content/EX13-sparkplugb-mqtt.md): SparkplugB protobuf decoding and Ignition integration
- [EX14 — ActiveMQ Enterprise Broker](content/EX14-activemq-enterprise.md): ActiveMQ broker source to console
- [EX15 — MTConnect Agent Output](content/EX15-mtconnect-agent-output.md): Script source to MTConnect agent sink
- [EX16 — MTConnect Aggregation](content/EX16-mtconnect-aggregation.md): Remote MTConnect agent reader to local agent
- [EX17 — InfluxDB Time-Series](content/EX17-influxdb-time-series.md): Industrial PLCs to InfluxDB Cloud
- [EX18 — MongoDB Documents](content/EX18-mongodb-documents.md): EtherNet/IP PLC to MongoDB Atlas
- [EX19 — PostgreSQL Polling](content/EX19-postgresql-polling.md): PostgreSQL dynamic SQL queries as source
- [EX20 — SQL Server Reads](content/EX20-sql-server-reads.md): MSSQL encrypted connection as source
- [EX21 — Splunk Edge Hub](content/EX21-splunk-edge-hub.md): Multi-source to SplunkEhSDK gRPC sink
- [EX22 — JSON Web Scraper](content/EX22-json-web-scraper.md): REST API scraping with JSON path and MTConnect output
- [EX23 — Weather API](content/EX23-weather-api.md): NWS weather API source to console
- [EX24 — HTTP Client POST](content/EX24-http-client-post.md): Script source to HTTP POST sink
- [EX25 — Lua Data Transforms](content/EX25-lua-data-transforms.md): Lua scripting for data transformation
- [EX26 — Python Scripting](content/EX26-python-scripting.md): Python script source with lang_script
- [EX27 — Sliding Window Analytics](content/EX27-sliding-window-analytics.md): Sensor data with sliding window calculations
- [EX28 — Unified Namespace (UNS)](content/EX28-unified-namespace.md): Multi-source MQTT unified namespace pattern
- [EX29 — Multi-Machine Shop Floor](content/EX29-multi-machine-shop-floor.md): 5 protocols to 6+ sinks in one instance
- [EX30 — CNC Machine Simulator](content/EX30-cnc-machine-simulator.md): 3 script sources for analytics pipeline
- [EX31 — Self-Contained Dashboard](content/EX31-self-contained-dashboard.md): OPC-UA style config with embedded web dashboard
- [EX32 — MQTT Motor Aggregation](content/EX32-mqtt-motor-aggregation.md): MQTT sensors with cache-based aggregation
- [EX33 — ROS2 Robotics](content/EX33-ros2-robotics.md): ROS2 DDS topics to MQTT via DIME
- [EX34 — UDP Binary Protocol](content/EX34-udp-binary-protocol.md): UDP binary parsing with emit() fan-out
- [EX35 — CNC Fingerprinting](content/EX35-cnc-fingerprinting.md): Current transformer analytics for productivity tracking

## Connector Reference

- [REF01 — ActiveMQ](content/REF01-activemq.md): ActiveMQ message broker source
- [REF02 — ASC CPC](content/REF02-asc-cpc.md): ASC CPC source connector
- [REF03 — Beckhoff ADS](content/REF03-beckhoff-ads.md): Beckhoff TwinCAT ADS source
- [REF04 — Claude Code](content/REF04-claude-code.md): Claude AI analytics source (Alpha Preview)
- [REF05 — Console](content/REF05-console.md): Console output sink for debugging
- [REF06 — CSV Writer](content/REF06-csv-writer.md): CSV file output sink
- [REF07 — Ethernet/IP](content/REF07-ethernet-ip.md): Allen-Bradley / Rockwell EtherNet/IP source
- [REF08 — Fanuc Robot](content/REF08-fanuc-robot.md): Fanuc robot controller source (SRTP)
- [REF09 — Haas SHDR](content/REF09-haas-shdr.md): Haas CNC machine source via SHDR protocol
- [REF10 — HTTP Client](content/REF10-http-client.md): HTTP/HTTPS POST sink
- [REF11 — HTTP Server](content/REF11-http-server.md): HTTP server source and sink
- [REF12 — I3x Web Server](content/REF12-i3x-web-server.md): I3X object graph REST API sink (Alpha Preview)
- [REF13 — InfluxLP](content/REF13-influxlp.md): InfluxDB line protocol sink
- [REF14 — JSONWebScraper](content/REF14-json-web-scraper.md): JSON/REST API web scraper source
- [REF15 — Logger](content/REF15-logger.md): File-based logging sink
- [REF16 — ModbusTCP](content/REF16-modbus-tcp.md): Modbus TCP register source
- [REF17 — MongoDB](content/REF17-mongodb.md): MongoDB document sink
- [REF18 — MQTT](content/REF18-mqtt.md): MQTT broker source and sink
- [REF19 — MSSQL](content/REF19-mssql.md): SQL Server database source
- [REF20 — MTConnect Agent](content/REF20-mtconnect-agent.md): MTConnect agent source and sink
- [REF21 — MTConnect MQTT](content/REF21-mtconnect-mqtt.md): MTConnect MQTT protocol sink
- [REF22 — MTConnect SHDR](content/REF22-mtconnect-shdr.md): MTConnect SHDR adapter sink
- [REF23 — NWS Weather](content/REF23-nws-weather.md): National Weather Service API source
- [REF24 — OPC-DA](content/REF24-opc-da.md): OPC-DA (legacy COM) source
- [REF25 — OPC-UA](content/REF25-opc-ua.md): OPC-UA client source and server sink
- [REF26 — Postgres](content/REF26-postgres.md): PostgreSQL database source
- [REF27 — Redis](content/REF27-redis.md): Redis source and sink
- [REF28 — ROS2](content/REF28-ros2.md): ROS2 DDS topic source
- [REF29 — Script](content/REF29-script.md): Lua/Python script source
- [REF30 — Siemens S7](content/REF30-siemens-s7.md): Siemens S7 PLC source (S7comm)
- [REF31 — SNMP](content/REF31-snmp.md): SNMP device polling source
- [REF32 — SparkplugB](content/REF32-sparkplugb.md): SparkplugB MQTT source and sink
- [REF33 — Splunk EH SDK](content/REF33-splunk-eh-sdk.md): Splunk Edge Hub SDK sink (V1 and V2)
- [REF34 — Splunk HEC](content/REF34-splunk-hec.md): Splunk HTTP Event Collector sink
- [REF35 — TcpASCII](content/REF35-tcp-ascii.md): TCP ASCII text source
- [REF36 — TimescaleWS](content/REF36-timescale-ws.md): TimescaleDB web service source
- [REF37 — TrakhoundHTTP](content/REF37-trakhound-http.md): TrakHound HTTP API sink
- [REF38 — UDP Server](content/REF38-udp-server.md): UDP datagram source
- [REF39 — WebsocketServer](content/REF39-websocket-server.md): WebSocket server sink
- [REF40 — Wintriss SmartPAC](content/REF40-wintriss-smartpac.md): Wintriss SmartPAC press monitor source
- [REF41 — XMLWebScraper](content/REF41-xml-web-scraper.md): XML/XPath web scraper source
- [REF42 — Yaskawa Robot](content/REF42-yaskawa-robot.md): Yaskawa robot controller source (DX200/YRC1000)
